question.long: Is homeopathy an effective treatment beyond the placebo effect?

description: Results from studies evaluating the efficacy of homeopathic treatments compared to placebo

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of homeopathy

no.description: The literature suggests that homeopathy does not have any effect beyond placebo

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that homeopathy probably does not have an effect beyond placebo, but more research is cited

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that homeopathy might have an effect beyond placebo, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that homeopathy is an effective treatment beyond placebo

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of homeopathy beyond placebo

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of homeopathy beyond placebo, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of homeopathy beyond placebo, but there are mixed results in specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that homeopathy might have an effect beyond placebo, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that homeopathy may have an effect beyond placebo, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that homeopathy may have a small effect beyond placebo

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that homeopathy may have an effect beyond placebo, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that homeopathy is an effective treatment beyond placebo
